original_text: “On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben by their companies, the chief of the people of Reuben being Elizur the son of Shedeur,
korean_text: 남쪽에는 르우벤 군대 진영의 군기가 있을 것이라 르우벤 자손의 지휘관은 스데울의 아들 엘리술이요

sentences.original_text: shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 지파 진의 깃발이 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the chief of the people of Reuben
being Elizur the son of Shedeur
